subject: Fwd: Throttle not working anymore
description_text:
Bonjour,

depuis aujourd'hui la pédale d'accéleration ne fonctionne plus. Les autres
fonctionnent correctement, ainsi que les VAM. J'ai essayé de tout mettre à
jour, de tout débrancher et rebrancher, de relancer le PC, mais elle ne
marche toujours pas.

Pouvez-vous m'aider ?

Merci,

---

Hello,

Since today, the throttle pedal has stopped working. The other pedals are
fine, as well as VAMs. I tried updating everything, unplugging and
reconnecting all cables, restarting the computer, but it still doesn’t work.

Could you please help me?

Thanks,

Pierre Fiorelli

conversations.body_text: Hi Pierre Fiorelli,     Please check whether the plastic component on the throttle pedal is damaged. If it’s intact, click “Offset” in the software and set the initial pedal percentage to zero in the pop-up window. After that, perform a recalibration. If the issue persists, try swapping the throttle and clutch connectors to determine whether the problem is with the throttle pedal itself or the throttle port on the main controller.

thanks for your answer.

I checked the plastic component and it seems ok. I tried to set the offset
but the result is the same. And at least, I swapped the clutch and the
throttle. The clutch pedal is working fine (I can see the throttle position
moving), but not the throttle pedal (the clutch position doesn't change).
nevertheless, there is a spark when I plug the main controller, not sure
it's normal (check the video)

thanks

After the update, the device version should display as CPU1: 2.0.5, CPU2: 2.0.3.
